body_html:
And I checked a bit the output graph_def a bit, it does seem to hold the values of the variables:

node {
  name: "the_var"
  op: "Const"
  attr {
    key: "dtype"
    value {
      type: DT_FLOAT
    }
  }
  attr {
    key: "value"
    value {
      tensor {
        dtype: DT_FLOAT
        tensor_shape {
          dim {
            size: 3
          }
        }
        tensor_content: "\344\336:?<\306\223>4\231@?"
      }
    }
  }
}
